name: Gim'a'gift
description:
Done for Pico-8 Advent Project 2018.

You're Santa and you have to get back the gifts those aliens stole. from you. Shoot them and avoid bullets, collect presents to make new gifts and drop them to the houses for extra points and make people happy!

Commands!

  • Arrow keys : move Santa
  • Z / Square button : shoot
  • X / Cross button : drop a gift when available
